content: this pattern is also available for free https //spinayarncrochet com/blobfish-free-crochet-pattern/ this blobfish pattern doesn t require any stuffing one of the key design features is that the mouth is worked into the piece as a regular round and then left open with the bottom of the piece pushed upwards to create a concave base as a result you could easily turn this funny little fish into a bag it would also make a hilarious little desk-mate since it sits so perfectly flat
